title: Potential sensitive information can be displayed in cleartext in FortiOS CLI window
summary: A cleartext storage of sensitive information vulnerability in FortiOS command line interface may allow an authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information such as users passwords by connecting to FortiGate CLI and executing the "diag sys ha checksum show" command.

operating_system.description: FortiOS: greater equal 6.0.0, less equal 6.0.11, fixed in 6.0.12, 6.2.5, 6.4.0
FortiOS: greater equal 6.2.0, less equal 6.2.4, fixed in 6.2.5, 6.4.0
